something_went_wrong.message: This usually is a temporary error. Check on the gitter forum in case others are facing similar problem or try again later. If the problem persists log a ticket on help.ost.com

internal_server_error.message: This usually is a temporary error. Check on the gitter forum in case others are facing similar problem or try again later. If the problem persists log a ticket on help.ost.com

invalid_params.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See "err.error_data" array for more details.

invalid_elasticsearch_params.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing.

es_data_not_found.message: Data not found in es. Please try after sometime.
